statements: SELECT * FROM live_broadcast_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE channel_id = 2;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE program_id = 10;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM live_broadcast_programs ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' AND end_time < '2022-03-01';
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE channel_id = 1 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE program_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE channel_id = 2 ORDER BY end_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE start_time > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_time;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time, channel_id FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE program_name LIKE 'News%';
SELECT * FROM ProgramSchedule LIMIT 5;
SELECT program_name, program_time FROM ProgramSchedule WHERE program_channel = 'ABC';
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_time FROM ProgramSchedule WHERE program_duration > 30;
SELECT program_name, program_duration FROM ProgramSchedule ORDER BY program_duration DESC;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM Channel WHERE channel_frequency > 50.0;
SELECT program_name, program_channel FROM ProgramSchedule WHERE program_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY program_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ProgramSchedule JOIN Channel ON ProgramSchedule.program_channel = Channel.channel_name WHERE program_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ProgramSchedule WHERE program_duration > 60 AND program_channel LIKE '%News%' ORDER BY program_time ASC;

SELECT program_name, program_duration, channel_type FROM ProgramSchedule JOIN Channel ON ProgramSchedule.program_channel = Channel.channel_name WHERE channel_type = 'Entertainment' ORDER BY program_duration DESC;

SELECT program_id, program_name, program_time, channel_name FROM ProgramSchedule AS PS JOIN Channel AS C ON PS.program_channel = C.channel_name WHERE channel_frequency > 50 ORDER BY program_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM live_broadcast_programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_time FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE channel_id = 1;
SELECT presenter_name, program_name FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE program_time >= '2022-05-01';
SELECT program_id, program_name, channel_name FROM live_broadcast_programs JOIN channels ON live_broadcast_programs.channel_id = channels.channel_id;
SELECT presenter_name, presenter_bio, presenter_email FROM presenters;
SELECT program_name, program_time, presenter_name FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE channel_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE program_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY program_time DESC;
SELECT presenter_name, presenter_bio FROM presenters WHERE presenter_name LIKE 'J%' AND presenter_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT program_name, program_description FROM live_broadcast_programs JOIN channels ON live_broadcast_programs.channel_id = channels.channel_id WHERE channel_name = 'News Channel';
SELECT * FROM live_broadcast_programs WHERE program_description LIKE '%live%' ORDER BY program_time ASC, program_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM broadcast_programs;
SELECT program_name, broadcast_time FROM broadcast_programs WHERE program_type='News';
SELECT program_name, broadcast_time, program_type FROM broadcast_programs ORDER BY broadcast_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM channels;
SELECT channel_name FROM channels ORDER BY channel_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM broadcast_programs WHERE program_type='News';
SELECT program_name, broadcast_time FROM broadcast_programs ORDER BY broadcast_time DESC;

SELECT program_name, channel_name FROM broadcast_programs JOIN broadcasting_schedule ON broadcast_programs.program_id = broadcasting_schedule.program_id JOIN channels ON broadcasting_schedule.channel_id = channels.channel_id;
SELECT host_name, host_type FROM hosts WHERE host_type='Host' OR host_type='Correspondent';

SELECT program_name, broadcast_time, channel_name FROM broadcast_programs JOIN broadcasting_schedule ON broadcast_programs.program_id = broadcasting_schedule.program_id JOIN channels ON broadcasting_schedule.channel_id = channels.channel_id WHERE broadcast_time >= NOW();
SELECT * FROM BroadcastPrograms;
SELECT program_name, program_type FROM BroadcastPrograms ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT channel_name, channel_type FROM BroadcastChannels WHERE channel_type = 'News';
SELECT viewer_name, city, country FROM ProgramViewers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY viewer_name ASC;
SELECT program_name, start_time, end_time FROM BroadcastPrograms WHERE program_type = 'Sports' ORDER BY start_time DESC;

SELECT * FROM ProgramSchedule JOIN BroadcastPrograms ON ProgramSchedule.program_id = BroadcastPrograms.program_id JOIN BroadcastChannels ON ProgramSchedule.channel_id = BroadcastChannels.channel_id WHERE ProgramSchedule.air_date = '2022-01-15';

SELECT ProgramSchedule.schedule_id, BroadcastPrograms.program_name, BroadcastChannels.channel_name, ProgramSchedule.air_date FROM ProgramSchedule JOIN BroadcastPrograms ON ProgramSchedule.program_id = BroadcastPrograms.program_id JOIN BroadcastChannels ON ProgramSchedule.channel_id = BroadcastChannels.channel_id WHERE ProgramSchedule.air_date > '2022-01-15' ORDER BY ProgramSchedule.air_date DESC;
SELECT viewer_name, city, country FROM ProgramViewers WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';

SELECT ViewerWatchHistory.watch_id, ProgramViewers.viewer_name, BroadcastPrograms.program_name, ViewerWatchHistory.watch_date FROM ViewerWatchHistory JOIN ProgramViewers ON ViewerWatchHistory.viewer_id = ProgramViewers.viewer_id JOIN BroadcastPrograms ON ViewerWatchHistory.program_id = BroadcastPrograms.program_id WHERE ViewerWatchHistory.watch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM ProgramSchedule ORDER BY air_date ASC, schedule_id DESC;
